thread.title: Serbian Instagram Model Aleksandra Nikolic's Feed Is on Fire
thread.title_full: Serbian Instagram Model Aleksandra Nikolic's Feed Is on Fire

title: Serbian Instagram Model Aleksandra Nikolic's Feed Is on Fire
text:
Facebook Get ready to break a sweat. 
We spend a lot of time on Instagram (no, really—a lot of time), and when we're not living vicariously through our favorite FOMO-inducing accounts, we're checking out some particularly talented users. So when our GQ castings team finds a ' grammer worth shouting out, we think it's our duty to share him or her with you, dear followers. Up today, Serbian model Aleksandra Nikolic . 
Aleksandra Nikolic can't stand cold weather. The model and aspiring actress is most comfortable where it's hot, or at least where the sun is shining—we can relate. The Eastern European beauty can most often be found at either 30,000 feet in the air or laying on a sandy beach at sea level. Every post on her sunny Instagram feed shows Nikolic in a new exotic locale. We chatted her up about life, reading the comments, and her most prized possession. Check her out here and of course give her a follow. 
Where are you right now? 
Somewhere above the clouds  Traveling home. Loading 
Where did you grow up? 
I grew up in Serbia. 
https://www.instagram.com/p/BBnoU3dMxn-/ 
If you weren’t a model, what career would you pursue? 
If I wasn't a model I would be an actress probably. Loading 
What is your mantra? (If you don't have one, make one up. We'll wait.) 
What you think, you become. What you feel, you attract. What you imagine, you create! Loading 
What makes you feel sexy? 
Being natural and spontaneous. View on Instagram 
Where have you never been but want to go? 
I'm a beach lover! One of the main purposes of my travels is to avoid winter ... so that would be Seychelles! Loading 
Do you read the comments? 
Yes, I think we all do. It's interesting to see how other people see us. Loading View on Instagram 
What is the craziest thing you’ve done on a shoot? 
I've done lots of funny things  But the craziest thing was when I went through the glass door (not on purpose), LOL. Loading View on Instagram 
How do you spend your time off? 
I travel a lot, but when I do have some time off, I Like to spend it with my friends, eating good food with some good wine, workout, go to the beach...enjoy life in every possible way! Loading 
What is your most prized possession? 
My Family.
